title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.4 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.4 - Eligibility

State Regulations

Any county, city, town, or village in New York State is
eligible for an award for any project which was initiated anytime within a
period of five years preceding the year for which the award is made. In case of
a cooperative endeavor, two or more local governments may be eligible for a
co-award which may be divided among the cooperating local
governments. Notes

810.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
